description: pam-auth-update - manage PAM configuration using packaged profiles

current  PAM  configuration,  without  prompting. This  option  must not be used by package maintainer scripts; it is intended for use by administrators only.

from  the  system  configuration. pam-auth-update  --remove should be used to remove profiles from the configuration before the modules they reference are  removed from  disk,  to  ensure  that  PAM is in a consistent and usable state at all times during package upgrades or removals.
